files.summary: SSO login handler for the MyGME (Graduate Medical Education) portal integration. Performs RC4 decryption of SSO tokens, validates user credentials via HTTP requests, URL-decodes parameters, and authenticates users through UserBusiness.
files.businessPurpose: Handles single sign-on authentication from external MyGME systems into the MyEvaluations platform using RC4 encryption
keyMethods: Page_Load - Processes SSO login request, decrypts tokens, and authenticates user
GetKeyValue - Retrieves RC4 encryption key from configuration
URlDecode - Custom URL decoding utility for SSO parameters

directoryOverview: Single-file module implementing SSO login integration for MyGME (Graduate Medical Education) systems. Uses RC4 encryption for secure token exchange and handles external authentication flow into the MyEvaluations platform.
keyWorkflows: Receive SSO request from MyGME external system
Decrypt RC4-encrypted credentials and validate user
Authenticate and redirect user into the MyEvaluations session
